item.title: The Someline Apple Tree app will produce apples for charity as long as you refrain from using your phone
item.description:
Source: Google Play. Libern Lin, a student entrepreneur attending Republic Polytechnic in Singapore, has expanded his app, Someline Apple Tree, with financial support from the Singapore Computer Society (SCS). The app incentivizes real-life interactions by rewarding users with digital apples for reducing phone usage. Lin, the app’s creator, explained that they wanted to use the app’s concept for a good cause. So, they used the S$30,000 grant from SCS to add a charitable component to the app in line with IDA’s Code for Charity*...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-someline-apple-tree-app-will-produce-apples-for-charity-as-long-as-you-refrain-from-using-your-phone/

item.title: Australian businesses have the option to utilize uChoose for their corporate rewards program
item.description:
Source: uChoose website. i2c, a company providing card processing and new financial service solutions, partnered with Corporate Prepaid Solutions (CPS), a prepaid program manager, to launch the first of several corporate prepaid programs. This launch features the uChoose corporate rewards gift card in Australia. The uChoose card, enabled by i2c’s global processing platform, is a ready-made solution for companies wanting to provide a Visa-branded gift card. Businesses can personalize the card to match their branding...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/australian-businesses-have-the-option-to-utilize-uchoose-for-their-corporate-rewards-program/
